description: The CompTIA Advanced Security Practitioner (CASP) Course (CAS-001), powered by Calibrate, helps existing and prospective IT professionals develop mastery of the knowledge and skills required to conceptualize, design and implement security solutions at the enterprise level. Individuals who successfully complete this course will have the knowledge necessary to meet the requirements of the CASP (CAS-001) certification exam and will be well-positioned to apply their new knowledge and critical thinking skills to a wide range of complex, enterprise-level security scenarios.
title: CompTIA Advanced Security Practitioner: CAS-001
